attributes.action: Help/support and inpatient facilities in Northern Ireland for people suffering with Eating Disorders
attributes.additional_details: In Northern Ireland there is NO inpatient help or support whatsoever for people suffering with this illness and people have to go to England for inpatient care and help and they shouldn't have to.  Everyone has to be made more aware that this illness is a mental disorder also and it is serious and can be fatal. There is help here for other addictions and illnesses so there should be for this mental disorder aswell!
